name: King of the Roots (Seal of Spades)
name_original: King of the Roots (Seal of Spades)
description:
You are a root, and you want to go back home. However, there is only one place available. So I guess you'll have to fight for it.

Choose your vegetable and stab your way to the shiny spot in the ground. You can also throw seeds with different effects. There can only be one king of the roots!

V1.2 is controler compatible

Controls - Game Jam VersionPlayer 1Player 2movearrow keysWASD(brief) shovel attack
(hold) throw seedKFhold - 
(on shiny spot) get rooted
(elsewhere) swap weaponLQ Controls - V1.2Player 1
 keyboardPlayer 2
keyboardControllermovearrow keysWASDLeft stick / D-Padshovel attack
(hold) throw seedKFAswap seed type
(on shiny spot) root yourself)LEX

Made in 48h for Global Game Jam 2023

Credits : Maxime, Olivia, Theodor, Alkam, Adarsh & Jean
